name: Plant party (Crazyk1k1)
description:
Plant Party is a 3d sort game where you incarnate a gardener who need to sort a lot of plant in 4 area according to plant's need. The objective is to make the best score before the end time.

-----------------------------

My team:

Clement Boutevin (programming, game designer, UI designer, sound designer)
